mvc\/masks.Are you sure you want to delete this sta: Are you sure you want to delete this standard letter?
mvc\/masks.Here you can modify the standard letters: Here you can modify the standard letters but they use a system of "templates" with which you have to be very cautious.
mvc\/masks.The best is to duplicate an existing sta: The best is to duplicate an existing standard letter and modify it.
mvc\/masks.Once finished, put it in default if it i: Once finished, put it in default if it is used on a feature without choice (eg certificates), and will test it in context.
mvc\/masks.Then you can erase the old one or else r: Then you can erase the old one or else redo it if your modification returns an error.
